title: New Call Screen beta for Pixel phones introduces AI voices to screen spam calls
description: Google is working on new ways to filter out scammers and is asking Pixel users for feedback on how to improve it.

title: These Android apps could be sending your data to China without you knowing
description: Two Android apps found in the Play Store, secretly stealing data and sending it to a server in China.

title: EA is making a single-player Black Panther game
description: Electronic Arts has announced Cliffhanger Games, who will be working on a single-player third-person Black Panther game.

title: Hackers steal millions after cracking Revolut payment systems
description: Before Revolut managed to plug the hole, hackers stole $20 million.

title: Twitter traffic really is tanking, Cloudflare reveals, but is anyone that surprised?
description: There are many reasons why Twitter is in collapse, and we’re going to discuss them all, here.

title: Evernote is laying off staff and relocating to Europe
description: Evernote will now be run from Europe in major move from Bending Spoons leadership.

title: Microsoft’s cloud ambitions for Windows could kill off desktop PCs – and sooner than we expected
description: Microsoft might bring cloud-powered Windows PCs to consumers in just a few months.

title: Episode 1 of Apple TV Plus’ most spectacular sci-fi show is coming to YouTube for free
description: More people need to know that Apple is making some of the most spectacular sci-fi shows around.

title: Linn teams up with iPod designer to unveil stunning Apple-esque turntable
description: Apple's former design chief has updated one of the world's most iconic audio players.

title: Rainbow Six Siege cheater has been found guilty of swatting Ubisoft Montreal offices
description: After numerous false reports and various other offences, this Rainbow Six Siege cheater has finally been found guilty and sentenced.

title: Google Calendar makes one small tweak to massively improve your working day
description: Sharing your working location in Google Calendar just got a whole lot more useful thanks to this update.

title: This Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 5 leak shows the phone in hand and on video
description: Photos and a video of a Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 5 dummy unit have leaked, showing the likely design from numerous angles.

title: AI could help workers claw back hundreds of hours
description: Businesses should be doing more to train and encourage workers to use AI tools, new study claims.

title: Windows 11 should soon get a lot more Android apps (but there’s no sign of Threads yet)
description: Feel like Android apps are too thin on the ground in Windows 11? That could change before too long.

title: Watch out - that Windows update could actually just be ransomware
description: File encryption ransomware attacks are increasingly common - here’s the latest one you need to look out for.

title: BT CEO Philip Jansen set to step down
description: Jansen announces he'll be stepping down as BT CEO within the next 12 months.

title: Action-roguelike Ninja or Die: Shadow of the Sun is out next month
description: This upcoming action-roguelike Ninja or Die is as exhilarating as it is difficult, and in less than a month, you'll be able to enjoy it as well.

title: 343 Industries is working with modders to restore Halo’s original cut content
description: The current Halo development team, 434 Industries, and a talented group of modders, are restoring the first Halo on PC.

title: Fear not, min-maxers - you can respec in Baldur's Gate 3
description: Larian Studios has confirmed Baldur's Gate 3 players will be able to respec.

title: Arma 3's newest DLC is all about killing Nazis
description: Immersive military sim Arma 3 is adding new, World War Two-themed DLC which takes players back to Nazi-occupied Normandy.

title: Amazon UK warehouse workers to strike during Prime Day
description: Prepare for possible Amazon Prime Day delays following news of strike.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Monday, July 10 (game #532)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.
